xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content: ## Livetable webide.application.projectName=Project name webide.application.spaces=Spaces webide.application.pages=Pages webide.application.xarVersion=XAR Version webide.application.codeSpace=Code Space webide.application.doc.date=Date webide.application._actions=Actions ##WebHome webide.webhome.addModal=Add a project webide.webhome.add=Add webide.webhome.codeSpaceDescription=Space for your technical pages webide.webhome.error.name=You have to choose a project name! webide.webhome.error.code=You have to choose a project code space! webide.webhome.add.pages=Add pages webide.webhome.add.spaces=Add spaces webide.webhome.spaces.info=Here you can choose the spaces you want to add as a folder in your project. All current and future pages from these spaces will be added in the project. You will still be able to change that list later (add or remove spaces). webide.webhome.pages.info=Here you can choose additional pages you want to add in your project. They will appear in the project pages even if the corresponding space in not in the previous list. ##Menu webide.menu.project=Project webide.menu.export=Export as XAR webide.menu.button.refresh=Refresh the menu webide.menu.button.show=Show the menu webide.menu.button.hide=Hide the menu webide.menu.view.physical=Physical view webide.menu.view.logical=Logical view webide.menu.empty=(% class="noitems"%)Empty webide.menu.unauthorized=(% class="noitems"%)Unauthorized webide.menu.add=Add... webide.menu.rename.space=Rename space {0} webide.menu.rename.page=Rename page {0} ##Add menu webide.menu.add.localJS=Add JS to the page webide.menu.add.localCSS=Add CSS to the page webide.menu.add.localSheet=Add a sheet to the page ##Remove menu webide.menu.remove.page=Delete from the wiki webide.menu.remove.object=Delete from the page webide.menu.remove.project=Remove from the project ##Edit menu webide.menu.view.physical.view=View webide.menu.view.physical.editWiki=Edit content webide.menu.view.physical.editObjects=Objects ({0}) webide.menu.view.physical.editClass=Class ({0}) webide.menu.view.physical.attach=Attachments ({0}) webide.menu.view.logical.editClass=Edit fields webide.menu.view.logical.editSheet=Edit sheet webide.menu.view.logical.editTemplate=Edit template webide.menu.view.logical.editWiki=Edit content webide.menu.view.logical.edit=Edit ##Classes menu webide.menu.category.classes=Classes webide.menu.category.classes.add=Add a class webide.menu.category.classes.addSheet=Add a sheet webide.menu.category.classes.addTemplate=Add a template ##Pages menu webide.menu.category.pages=Pages webide.menu.category.pages.addSpace=Add a space webide.menu.category.pages.addExistingPage=Add an existing page webide.menu.category.pages.addPage=Add a new page ##Other categories webide.menu.category.js=JS webide.menu.category.js.add=Add global JavaScript webide.menu.category.css=CSS webide.menu.category.css.add=Add global CSS webide.menu.category.macros=Macros webide.menu.category.macros.add=Add a Macro webide.menu.category.panels=Panels webide.menu.category.panels.add=Add a Panel webide.menu.category.uix=UI Extensions webide.menu.category.uix.add=Add a UI Extension webide.menu.category.translations=Translations webide.menu.category.translations.add=Add a Translation page webide.menu.category.translations.addLanguage=Add a language ##Modals webide.modals.commons.space=Space webide.modals.commons.page=Page webide.modals.commons.object=Object webide.modals.commons.class=Class webide.modals.commons.pageFullName=Page full name webide.modals.commons.pageName=Page name webide.modals.commons.name=Name webide.modals.commons.cancel=Cancel webide.modals.add.page.title=Add a page webide.modals.add.page.button=Add the page webide.modals.add.page.language=Language webide.modals.add.page.language.list=Supported languages list from your wiki administration webide.modals.add.page.type=Type webide.modals.add.page.type.content=Content page webide.modals.add.page.type.item=Item page webide.modals.add.page.info.content=Page where you can edit the content and add JS, CSS, etc. webide.modals.add.page.info.item=Page with an instance of your class webide.modals.add.space.title=Add a space webide.modals.add.space.button=Add the space webide.modals.add.object.title=Add an object webide.modals.add.object.button=Add the object webide.modals.add.class.title=Add a class webide.modals.add.class.button=Add the class webide.modals.add.class.sheet.actions=Sheet action webide.modals.add.class.sheet.edit=Edit webide.modals.add.class.sheet.view=View webide.modals.add.class.sheet.inline=Inline webide.modals.closeTab.description=You have unsaved content in this tab ([0}]), do you want to continue? All unsaved modifications will be lost permanently webide.modals.closeTab.title=Unsaved content webide.modals.closeTab.button.save=Save & close webide.modals.closeTab.button.nosave=Close without saving webide.modals.delete.object.label=Are you sure you want to delete that object webide.modals.delete.object.title=Delete an object webide.modals.delete.object.button=Delete the object webide.modals.delete.page.label=Are you sure you want to delete that page webide.modals.delete.page.title=Delete a page webide.modals.delete.page.button=Delete the page webide.modals.delete.class.label=Are you sure you want to delete that class webide.modals.delete.class.title=Delete a class webide.modals.delete.class.button=Delete the class webide.modals.delete.class.deleteAlso=Delete also webide.modals.delete.class.allSheets=All bound sheets webide.modals.delete.class.template=The class template webide.modals.switchClass.label=You have unsaved content in this tab, do you want to continue? All unsaved modifications will be lost permanently webide.modals.switchClass.title=Switch class editor webide.modals.switchClass.button.save=Save & switch webide.modals.switchClass.button.nosave=Switch without saving ##Sheet webide.sheet.welcome=Welcome to the XWiki WebIDE, you can use it to create, edit and export XWiki Applications. This is the Master Page of the project, it contains meta-data such as the list of Spaces and Pages which are part of the project. webide.sheet.error=**Your code space is not defined**. It is the space where the global elements (JS, CSS, TRanslations, Macros...) will be placed when created from the logical view. You should choose your code space as soon as posible. Without code space specified, the pages will be placed in the space **{0}Code** (that space has been added to your project) webide.sheet.error.link=Change the code space webide.sheet.howto.getstarted=__Get started__: webide.sheet.howto.getstarted.1=* **Edit a page** in your project by clicking on one of the edit buttons in the lefthand panel - you can edit the page in different modes for editing the content and metadata webide.sheet.howto.getstarted.2=* **Add a space** by clicking the "add new" button on the left (Physical view) or the {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} in the "Pages" category (Logical view) webide.sheet.howto.getstarted.3=* **Add an existing page** for times when you need to add a page which must be in a Space which is not part of your application's code webide.sheet.howto.getstarted.4=* **Create a new page** when you need to create a new empty page clicking on the {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} in the selected folder webide.sheet.howto.getstarted.5=* **Export your project** as a .xar file which can be imported to other wikis or published on extensions.xwiki.org. webide.sheet.howto.shortcutsSH=__Shortcuts with Syntax Highlighting enabled__: webide.sheet.howto.shortcutsSH.1=* **Ctrl + F** : Search (first result) webide.sheet.howto.shortcutsSH.2=** **Ctrl + G** or **F3** : Find next result webide.sheet.howto.shortcutsSH.3=** **Ctrl + Shift + G** : Find previous result webide.sheet.howto.shortcutsSH.4=* **Alt + F** : Persistent search (the search box stays opened after first result) webide.sheet.howto.shortcutsSH.5=* **Tab** : 2-spaces indentation webide.sheet.howto.shortcutsSH.6=* **Shift + Tab** : Automatic indentation webide.sheet.howto.shortcutsIDE=__Shortcuts for the wiki and object editors__: webide.sheet.howto.shortcutsIDE.1=* **Alt + S**: Save & View webide.sheet.howto.shortcutsIDE.2=* **Alt + Shift + S** : Save & Continue webide.sheet.howto.shortcutsIDE.3=* **Alt + C** : Discard & View webide.sheet.howto.shortcutsIDE.4=* **Alt + Shift + C** : View in a new tab webide.sheet.howto.shortcutsXWiki=__Shortcuts in XWiki__: webide.sheet.howto.shortcutsXWiki.1=* **W** : Open the Web IDE in the current page webide.sheet.howto.improveXP=__Improve your IDE Experience__: webide.sheet.howto.improveXP.1=The XWiki WebIDE uses Syntax Highlighting and Auto-completion extensions to improve the user interface. You can read the documentation pages below to learn more about these extensions : webide.sheet.howto.improveXP.linkSH=Syntax Highlighting documentation webide.sheet.howto.improveXP.linkAC=Auto-Completion documentation webide.sheet.howto.doc=To learn about other features of the XWiki WebIDE, see the [[Online Documentation>>{0}]] on xwiki.org. ##Sheet buttons webide.sheet.button.delete.title=Remove the content from XWiki webide.sheet.button.savecontinue=Save & Continue webide.sheet.button.saveview=Save & View webide.sheet.button.cancel=Cancel webide.sheet.button.viewtab=View in a new tab ##Objects (ApplicationObjects) webide.objects.addLabel=Add an object webide.objects.selectClass=Select a class webide.objects.buttons.add=Add webide.objects.buttons.expand=Expand all webide.objects.buttons.collapse=Collapse all webide.objects.buttons.remove=Delete object
